forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 77. Northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. North wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfurls over Boston, a gentle warmth envelops the city, casting a glow that beckons residents to step outside. The sun presides over the landscape, illuminating the streets with a brilliance that stirs a sense of anticipation. A light breeze whispers through the trees, offering a refreshing touch as it brushes past at just a few miles per hour. With temperatures nudging towards the upper seventies, one might find themselves drawn to parks where families gather, perhaps indulging in a leisurely stroll or simply basking in the radiant light. 

As night approaches, the forecast hints at a cozy transition; partly cloudy skies will cradle the evening, inviting the cool embrace of temperatures ticking down to around fifty-six. A slight north breeze may encourage a light jacket or a soft sweater, perfect for watching the sun dip below the horizon. The tranquility of the coming evening may soon entice you to visit a quaint café, savoring a warm drink while watching the world shift tones around you. With conditions this pleasant, a simple outing, perhaps wandering through the neighborhood or enjoying an impromptu picnic, promises to capture the spirit of a day well spent in the heart of Boston.
